Have I had a measure of being timid as opposed to being bold and not having the courage because I was afraid of what maybe somebody would think or somebody would say or what they would think of me? No, no, no, we need to have courage because can I tell you this evening it matters a whole lot more what God thinks of me than what any man thinks of me, and the same is true of you. Oh, that God would give us some courage tonight, courage to stand for truth and for right, courage to proclaim the gospel of the Lord Jesus Christ. Let's pray together. Father, we love you. We thank you for loving us. Thank you for your word, the truth contained therein. I pray, Lord, that you bless our time of prayer. We thank you for the privilege. Pray that you'd be honored and glorified for it's in Christ's name we pray, amen.
